font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 易受感染的性质或状态： the quality or state of having little resistance to some outside agent
【例】 A weak immune system causes increased susceptibility to disease. 弱的免疫系统会增大患病的概率。
【近】 defenselessness, vulnerability, weakness
【反】 immunity, invulnerability 免疫

【记】 accept 接受
